thread.title: Pa. Girls: Pa. girls: Sargent wins SOL cross-country title
thread.title_full: Pa. Girls: Pa. girls: Sargent wins SOL cross-country title

title: Pa. Girls: Pa. girls: Sargent wins SOL cross-country title
text:
Sarah Richart of Cheltenham completed the course in 19:15 to win the division championship. Saddie Gustafson, Sophie Gustafson and Emily Stewart finished sixth, seventh and eighth, respectively to pace Upper Dublin to the team title.
Suburban One Continental Championship 
Maddie Villalba of Central Bucks West finished in 18:34 to win the division title. Ariana Gardizy, Olivia Dyer and Phoebe Clowser finished second, sixth and seventh, respectively, and North Penn won the team championship. SOCCER 
NONLEAGUE 
West Chester Rustin 1, Neshaminy 0: Cassie Cheeseman scored the winner with 29 minutes left in the second half. The visitors recorded their sixth straight win and 12th shutout of the year. 
St. Basil 2, Lower Moreland 1: Meghan DiDomenico and Sophia Mahoney netted goals for the home team. Abbey Carter added one assist. 
MaST Charter 2, Bodine 0: Allyson Holtz and Mackenzie Murphy scored for the visitors and assisted on each other's goals. PUBLIC LEAGUE 
Northeast 1, Masterman 0: Lycia Sweeney scored in the first half for the visitors. FRIENDS SCHOOLS LEAGUE 
Westtown 4, Moorestown Friends 3: Isabella Almonte and Maddie Roberts scored two goals apiece for the visitors. FIELD HOCKEY 
INTER-AC LEAGUE 
Germantown Acad. 7, Springside Chestnut Hill 3: Shayne Cerebe had a hat trick for the visitors. Sammy Popper added two goals. 
FRIENDS' SCHOOLS LEAGUE 
Westtown 5, Moorestown Friends 0: Katie DeLuca scored twice for the visitors. Dewi Henry, Sammie Pavlov and Julia Richards also scored. 
NONLEAGUE 
Notre Dame 2, Cardinal O'Hara 1: Quinn Maguire and Mary Kate Neff scored two straight second-half goals for the hosts.
